titleInfo.title: Introducing the Digital Collection: Historic Clothing Collection

mods.abstract: Summary description of the Historic Clothing Collection (1790-1990). The digital collection was officially launched in May 2018 thanks to funding provided by the Digital Seed Grant at Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University (MTSU). The primary investigator of the grant, Dr. Teresa King, is the TXMD Director at MTSU. The 390 piece digital collection is a portion of the 750 piece physical collection. The digital collection process and features are highlighted in this introductory summary.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Digital Initiatives, James E. Walker Library, Middle Tennessee State University
